name.baseName: 天然气液化 ;卡塔尔天然气; CML方法

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Liquefied natural gas (LNG) is expected to become an important part of the UK's energy supply as national hydrocarbon reserves on the continental shelf have begun to dwindle. However, the use of any carbon-based fuel runs counter to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions (GHG). As a result, an extensive environmental assessment is needed to analyse LNG imports into the UK.
液化天然气（LNG）预计将成为英国能源供应的重要组成部分，因为大陆架上的国家碳氢化合物储量已经开始减少。然而，使用任何碳基燃料都与温室气体排放（GHG）的减少背道而驰。因此，需要进行广泛的环境评估，以分析向英国进口液化天然气的情况。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: LNG imported from Qatar to Britain
卡塔尔进口到英国的液化天然气

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The analysis covers the supply chain, from gas extraction to distribution to end users, assuming state-of-the-art facilities and ships. Sensitivity analysis of key parameters, including energy requirements for liquefaction and vaporization processes, propulsion fuel, transport distance, tanker volume and feed gas composition, was also carried out
该分析涵盖了供应链，从天然气开采到分销给最终用户，假设拥有最先进的设施和船舶。还对关键参数进行了敏感性分析，包括液化和汽化过程的能源需求、推进燃料、运输距离、油轮体积和原料气成分
technology.technologicalApplicability: Liquefied natural gas (LNG) from Qatar is anticipated to play a crucial role in the energy supply for the United Kingdom, acting as an alternative to the diminishing hydrocarbon reserves from the continental shelf. Liquefied natural gas is utilized in various sectors, including residential heating, electricity generation, and as a fuel for transportation. The data set represents the environmental footprint of LNG imports from Qatar, covering the full supply chain from extraction to end-user delivery, and is relevant for stakeholders involved in energy planning, environmental impact assessment, and policy formulation in the context of UK's energy infrastructure.
来自卡塔尔的液化天然气（LNG）有望在英国的能源供应中发挥关键作用，作为大陆架减少的碳氢化合物储备的替代产品。液化天然气在各个行业中都有使用，包括住宅供暖、电力生成和作为运输燃料。该数据集代表了从卡塔尔到英国的LNG进口的环境足迹，涵盖了从提取到终端用户交付的完整供应链，并适用于能源规划、环境影响评估和制定与英国能源基础设施相关的政策的利益相关者。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The functional unit used in this study is 7 MJ of natural gas (total calorific value) delivered to end users under grid pressure (i.e. less than 1 bar). Because the purpose of this study is to calculate the environmental burden of natural gas production when it is delivered to end users, the use stage is not included.
本研究中使用的功能单位是在电网压力（即低于 1 bar）下输送给最终用户的 7 MJ 天然气（总热值）。由于本研究的目的是计算天然气在交付给最终用户时生产的环境负担，因此不包括使用阶段。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The distinction between foreground and background is used to identify direct, indirect and avoided emissions. Direct emissions come from the front end (LNG supply chain), while indirect emissions come from the back end. The assessment covers all these types of emissions.
前景和背景之间的区别用于识别直接、间接和避免的排放。直接排放来自前台（液化天然气供应链），而间接排放则来自后台。该评估涵盖所有这些类型的排放。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Tagliaferri, C., Clift, R., Lettieri, P. & Chapman, C. Liquefied natural gas for the UK: a life cycle assessment. Int J Life Cycle Assess 22, 1944–1956 (2017).
Tagliaferri, C., Clift, R., Lettieri, P. & Chapman, C. Liquefied natural gas for the UK: a life cycle assessment. Int J Life Cycle Assess 22, 1944–1956 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should pay close attention to the following methodological advice: The environmental impact assessment for LNG imports should include the entire supply chain, from extraction through to distribution to the final user. It is critical to account for direct, indirect, and avoided emissions when evaluating the life cycle of LNG imports. The functional unit of '7 MJ of natural gas delivered under grid pressure' should be upheld. This data set excludes the usage phase of natural gas. Sensitivity analysis should be conducted considering key parameters such as energy requirements, propulsion fuel, transport distance, tanker volume, and feed gas composition. Limitations of the CML method used in the assessment should be acknowledged, and the data should be interpreted within the technological and temporal boundaries established by the study.

本数据集的用户应特别注意以下方法学建议：LNG进口的环境影响评估应包括整个供应链，从提取到分发到最终用户。评估LNG进口的生命周期时，必须核算直接、间接和避免排放。应该保持功能单位为'在电网压力下交付的7 MJ天然气'。此数据集不包括天然气的使用阶段。应根据能源需求、推进燃料、运输距离、油轮体积和原料气成分等关键参数进行敏感性分析。应承认用于评估的CML方法的限制，并且应在研究确定的技术和时间边界内解释数据。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. This process comes from carbon dioxide emissions during the liquefaction stage
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。该过程来自液化阶段二氧化碳排放
The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Fossil. This process comes from carbon monoxide emissions during the liquefaction stage
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为fossil。该过程来自液化阶段一氧化碳排放
This process comes from the emission of hydrogen sulfide during the liquefaction stage
该过程来自液化阶段硫化氢排放
This process comes from the emission of nitrous oxide during the liquefaction stage
该过程来自液化阶段一氧化二氮排放
There is no input of much natural gas in the literature, assuming (1:1)
文献中没有input多少天然气，假设(1:1)
